message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great price, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. I'm confident you'll love it!

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This price is fair considering its value to me and your asking price. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,250. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you and my original asking price. Let me know what you think!
